message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.DS, cs.CR

This paper deals with graphical models, which are commonly used in machine learning and computer vision. The focus is on improving the accuracy of inference in these models, which is a key problem in the field of artificial intelligence. The paper also discusses theoretical questions about the strength of the LP relaxations, which is a topic that falls under the category of theoretical computer science (cs.CR). However, given the practical nature of the work and the focus on machine learning and computer vision, it is more likely that the paper would be classified under cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.CV (Computer Vision), or cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms).
